scripts.start:dev: npm run stop; npm run rm ; docker run --name pyrevprox -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -p 5000:5000 -p 5678:5678 --network my_network -d -e DEBUG=True pyrevprox:latest && sleep 2s
scripts.start:dev:old: npm run stop; npm run rm ; docker run --name pyrevprox -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -p 5000:5000 -p 5678:5678 --network my_network -d -e GEVENT_SUPPORT=True -e DEBUG=True pyrevprox:latest && sleep 2s
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run start:dev
scripts.createLocalCert:
openssl req -x509 -out src/localcert/localhost.crt -keyout src/localcert/localhost.key -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -sha256 -subj '/CN=localhost' -extensions EXT -config <( printf "[dn]
CN=localhost
[req]
distinguished_name = dn
[EXT]
subjectAltName=DNS:localhost
keyUsage=digitalSignature
extendedKeyUsage=serverAuth")
